docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: update

params.name: ipam
params.description: IP Address auto suggestion mode for this subnet, valid values are “DHCP”, “Internal DB”, “None”

params.name: from
params.description: Starting IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: to
params.description: Ending IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: domain_ids
params.description: Domains in which this subnet is part
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: dhcp_id
params.description: DHCP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: tftp_id
params.description: TFTP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: dns_id
params.description: DNS Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: boot_mode
params.description: Default boot mode for interfaces assigned to this subnet, valid values are “Static”, “DHCP”

params.name: location_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: organization_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type
